Name: Emi's Country Store and Farm
About the game: Play relaxed or timed in this Onet/Match 2 Game. Enjoy the nice graphics and the cute colorful tiles. Look beyond the nearest option and make every level a 3-star win. Catch the mouse while playing, earn bonus coins and create the nicest Country Store and Farm for Emi. Selling handmade crafts and bio natural products like food and art has always been the dream of Emi. Now you can help her to make this dream come through. Assist Emi in finding the best path to match items, catch the mice, earn bonus coins and build the best country and farm store in the village. You will enjoy this easy to learn, but difficult to master, unique matching puzzle game, have fun. Challenge yourself in Timed Mode, or kick back and soak in the relaxing country vibes in Relaxed Mode. Simple rules, but tons of possibilities! 100 levels full of fun handmade items Help Emi live her dream Relaxed and Timed game modes Calming soundtrack
